 6: /**
 7: * Converti $array en objet
 8: * 
 9: * 
10: * $arraytoobject = new ArrayToObject($array,FALSE);
11: *

13: * 
14: * @param array $array
15: * @param boolean $return
16: * @return object
17:  * @author Thibault Jeannet thibault.jeannet@gmail.com
18: */
19: class ArrayToObject {
20: 
21:     
22:     /**
23:      * 
24:      * @var array $array
25:      */
26:     private $array;
27:     
28:     /**
29:      *
30:      * @var object $object
31:      */
32:     public $object;
33: 
34:     
35:     public function __construct(array $array) {      
36:         $this->array = $array;
37:         $this->init();
38:         
39:     }
40:     
41:     private function init() {
42:         $this->object = json_decode(json_encode($this->array), FALSE);
43:     }
44:     
45:     public function convert() {
46:         return json_decode(json_encode($this->array), FALSE);
47:     }
48:     
49: }
